Metadata.title: World-class shipping services | Enka Shipping
Metadata.description: ENKA offers comprehensive shipping services in Europe and Asia. We guarantee on-time delivery, reliability and an individual approach to each order.
Metadata.keywords: enka, enka shipping, enka forwarding, shipping, logistics, transportation, river, oversize, inland, marine, truck, FTL, project cargo, breakbulk, pontoons, barges, cranes
Metadata.ogTitle: ENKA Shipping - Project cargo and shipping services
Metadata.ogDescription: Discover our complete transportation and shipping solutions tailored to your needs.
Metadata.twitterTitle: ENKA Shipping - Project cargo and shipping services
Metadata.twitterDescription: We offer reliable transportation and shipping services in Europe and Asia. Check out our offer!

HeroSection.subHeader: Reliable, professional service for your transport needs and logistics projects from planning to completion.

AboutSection.header: Enka - your trusted partner for logistics at any scale
AboutSection.textContent: Enka provides global transport services to companies all over the world. Our team of experienced professionals will deliver your cargo to your location at the exact time you specify. Our headquarters are based in Poland, from where we cooperate with our global network of partners. We have carried out dozens of projects, including complex oversize transports. Whether by land, sea or inland waterway, we offer solutions for every budget and every industry. We ensure smooth deliveries and the highest level of cargo security.

GlobalCoverage.text: We operate in Poland and all over the world. We have branches in Poland (Gdańsk and Milanówek) and Milan, Italy

ProjectCargo.text: Planning a complex logistics project? Take advantage of transport by sea, overland or by barge.

OnTime.text: Direct contact with an experienced freight forwarder guarantees order fulfilment under all circumstances.

ServicesSection.textContent: We carefully tailor each of our services to the customer's needs and the type of the cargo - with us, your shipment is in the right hands.

ProjectCargo.title: Project cargo
ProjectCargo.subtitle: Complex logistics projects at any scale

ExperienceSection.textContent: We have particular experience in services across Europe, the Middle East, and Central and East Asia. Find out more about our most commonly served regions:
ExperienceSection.mapImageAlt: World map with highlighted regions most commonly served by Enka
ExperienceSection.dislaimerText:
Interested in another direction?

Contact us - Enka operates worldwide.

1.content: ENKA has greatly improved the way I do business. I didn't have to worry about the logistics of transporting my goods across the country. Everything ran smoothly, which was a huge relief for me!
1.author: Piotr Pogorzelski
1.title: CEO of The Company

2.content: ENKA has greatly improved the way I do business. I didn't have to worry about the logistics of transporting my goods across the country. Everything ran smoothly, which was a huge relief for me!
2.author: Piotr Pogorzelski
2.title: CEO of The Company

ContactSection.textContent: Are you looking for an experienced shipping company or do you have some questions? Feel free to contact us!
ContactSection.name: Krzysztof Pietrusiak
ContactSection.title: Dyrektor Spedycji

Metadata.title: Project Cargo
Metadata.description: Transporting project cargo is our key specialization. We organize the transportation of demanding cargo across Europe and beyond.
Metadata.keywords: enka, enka shipping, enka forwarding, forwarding, logistics, transport, project cargo, cranes, project logistics, logistics projects

ProjectCargoPage.title: Project Cargo
ProjectCargoPage.subtitle: Transporting project cargo is our key specialization. With experience, modern equipment, and proven procedures, we are able to organize the transportation of demanding, heavy, and oversized cargo across Europe and beyond. Each project is treated individually, selecting optimal logistics solutions to ensure complete safety and timely execution.

OfferCranes.title: Specialized Cranes and Lifting Systems
OfferCranes.subtitle: We have our own crane resources, allowing us to offer comprehensive handling of loading and unloading heavy and oversized elements.
OfferCranes.altText: Installation of an industrial device on a construction site with the help of a crane

1.content: The DEMAG 2800 is a crawler crane with high lifting capacity, perfect for lifting the heaviest components.

2.content: Capability to organize mobile cranes and gantries tailored to the project specifics.

3.content: A professional operator team with many years of experience on major infrastructure investments.

OfferSpmt.title: Advanced Transport Systems – SPMT
OfferSpmt.subtitle: We have 95 SPMT modules (Self-Propelled Modular Transporter) – self-propelled transport units enabling the transportation of extremely heavy loads in hard-to-reach locations, confined spaces, and challenging terrain conditions.
OfferSpmt.altText: Two SPMT modules remotely controlled by a specialist transport a structural element

1.content: Each unit consists of 5-6 axles that can be configured to suit the load specifics.

2.content: Ability to operate in confined spaces – including precise maneuvering in industrial facilities and construction sites.

3.content: Capability to combine multiple modules for transporting loads exceeding 1000 tons!

OfferPlatforms.title: Specialized Platforms and Trailers
OfferPlatforms.subtitle: With access to various transport sets, we can transport both standard and non-standard loads.
OfferPlatforms.altText: Self-propelled harvester transported on a low-loader trailer

1.content: Multi-axle trailers for transporting long and heavy elements.

2.content: Low-bed trailers for transporting construction machinery and infrastructure elements.

3.content: Our own load securing and stabilization systems ensure the complete safety of transported elements.

OfferSupport.title: Full Technical and Documentation Support
OfferSupport.subtitle: The execution of complex projects requires not only appropriate equipment but also perfect preparation. We provide comprehensive support at every stage of transport:
OfferSupport.altText: Two people writing on paper with open laptops nearby

1.content: Preparation of detailed transport procedures, including route planning, risk analysis, and transshipment logistics.

2.content: Conducting necessary tests and obtaining required safety certifications.

3.content: Cooperation with independent inspectors who confirm proper loading, securing, and compliance with national and international transport regulations.

4.content: Handling all formalities, from obtaining permits for oversized transport to organizing escorts and securing travel routes.

OfferRealization.title: Project Execution in Europe and Beyond
OfferRealization.subtitle: We are active in markets across Europe but also carry out projects in more challenging regions.
OfferRealization.altText: View of the earth at night from space

1.content: We perform transports in developed regions where strict regulations and requirements for special transports are crucial.

2.content: We have experience with the specifics of local regulations and customs procedures.

3.content: Regions with a dynamically developing transport market, where our experience allows us to execute complex infrastructure projects.

4.content: We have transported cargo for major construction projects, including one of the largest investments in the region.

ProjectCargoPage.summaryContent: ENKA Project is capable of executing the most demanding transports worldwide. If you are looking for a reliable partner for handling oversized projects – we are at your service!

Metadata.title: Inland Transport
Metadata.description: Our company offers full logistics support for inland and combined transports with seaports.
Metadata.keywords: enka, enka shipping, enka forwarding, forwarding, logistics, transport, inland, river, river-sea, barges, pontoons, ferries, ships

InlandTransportPage.title: Inland and River-Sea Transport
InlandTransportPage.subtitle: River and river-sea transport is an efficient alternative to road and rail transport, especially for oversized and bulk cargo. Our company offers full logistics support for inland and combined transports with seaports.

OfferFleet.title: Specialized Fleet
OfferFleet.subtitle: Thanks to cooperation with renowned shipowners and operators, we have access to a wide range of vessels tailored to different cargo types.
OfferFleet.altText: Cargo ship sailing on a lake

1.content: An ideal solution for oversized transport.

2.content: Units designed for transporting exceptionally heavy and large elements.

3.content: Container barges allow for the transport of goods in containers.

4.content: We handle direct connections of inland transport with seaports.

OfferEquipment.title: Complete Loading and Securing Equipment
OfferEquipment.subtitle: We have our own specialized equipment for safe securing, lifting, and handling of cargo.
OfferEquipment.altText: Loading a cargo ship with a crane

1.content: Solutions ensuring even weight distribution, stabilization, and proper support for the cargo.

2.content: Solutions enabling precise positioning of heavy elements.

3.header: Securing Systems and Lashings (Chains, Straps, Storm Lashes)
3.content: Solutions ensuring safety during transport.

4.content: Solutions enabling the execution of complex transshipment operations.

OfferOrganizing.title: Comprehensive Organization
OfferOrganizing.subtitle: We execute transports on major rivers and port channels in Poland and Europe, with the possibility of integration with sea transport.
OfferOrganizing.altText: A river barge transporting coal passing under a bridge

1.content: We provide transshipment and storage in seaports.

2.header: Inland Rivers in Poland and Europe
2.content: We handle the largest European rivers, including the Oder, Vistula, Elbe, and Danube.

3.content: Solutions enabling the minimization of road transport.

OfferSupport.title: Logistical and Operational Support
OfferSupport.subtitle: Our company provides full organization of transport from planning to execution.
OfferSupport.altText: Two people writing on paper with open laptops nearby

1.content: We analyze routes and select optimal floating units.

2.content: We organize transshipment operations, securing, and stabilizing cargo.

3.content: We ensure compliance with regulations and safety standards.

OfferApplications.title: Project Execution in Europe and Beyond
OfferApplications.subtitle:
We execute transports for various industrial sectors, including:
  • Energy and heavy industry (technological modules, steel structures)
  • Road and rail infrastructure (bridge sections, prefabricates)
  • Construction and offshore (wind tower elements, platforms)
OfferApplications.altText: River flowing through a modern city, a group of cargo ships visible on the sea horizon

InlandTransportPage.summaryContent: With experience, equipment, and technical facilities, ENKA Project is capable of organizing the transport of oversized and heavy loads via inland routes. Contact us to discuss your project!

Metadata.title: Land Transport
Metadata.description: We offer full support in planning and executing transports, optimizing routes and tailoring them to the requirements of the cargo and client.
Metadata.keywords: enka, enka shipping, enka forwarding, forwarding, logistics, transport, land, ftl, ltl, oversized cargo, intermodal logistics, door-to-door, adr, refrigerated, trucks, road transport

LandTransportPage.title: Land Transport

OfferServices.title: Standard and Oversized Transport
OfferServices.subtitle: With a modern transport fleet, we provide a wide range of services tailored to individual client needs.
OfferServices.altText: Transport hub with a parking lot full of trucks and transport trains

1.content: Full Truck Load (FTL) and Less Than Truck Load (LTL) for various industries.

2.content: Specialized low-loader trailers, modular transport sets, and systems for transporting heavy machinery, steel structures, turbines, or transformers.

3.content: Transport of goods requiring controlled temperature.

4.content: Handling the transport of hazardous materials in compliance with international regulations.

OfferPlanning.title: Advanced Logistics and Route Planning
OfferPlanning.subtitle: We offer full support in planning and executing transports, optimizing routes and tailoring them to specific cargo and client requirements.

1.content: Adjusting routes to road and infrastructure limitations.

2.content: Organizing documentation for oversized transports.

3.content: Ensuring the safety of oversized cargo on national and international roads.

4.content: Enabling complex loading and unloading operations.

OfferRange.title: International and Intercontinental Transport
OfferRange.subtitle: Thanks to an extensive network of logistics partners, we provide transport not only in Europe but also in CIS countries, Central Asia, and the Middle East.
OfferRange.altText: Truck driving over a bridge above a green valley

1.content: Fast and efficient deliveries between European Union countries.

2.header: Transport to CIS Countries (Russia, Kazakhstan, Belarus, Ukraine)
2.content: Experience in handling cargo in demanding eastern markets.

3.content: The ability to integrate road transport with rail and sea to optimize costs and delivery time.

OfferFlexibility.title: Flexibility and Adaptation to Client Needs
OfferFlexibility.subtitle: Each transport is individually tailored to the client's requirements, ensuring maximum efficiency and transport safety.
OfferFlexibility.altText: Truck carrying a container through a container yard

1.content: Tracking cargo using modern GPS systems.

2.content: Capability for express dedicated transports.

3.content: Comprehensive service from the loading point to the final delivery point.

OfferSupport.title: Full Formal and Customs Support
OfferSupport.subtitle: For international transports, we offer support in handling formalities and customs procedures.
OfferSupport.altText: Two people writing on a paper beside open laptops

1.content: Complete documentation for export and import cargo.

2.content: Adjusting transport to national and international regulations.

3.content: Protecting cargo along the entire transport route.

LandTransportPage.summaryContent: Looking for a reliable partner in land transport? Contact us, and we will prepare the best logistics solution for you!

Metadata.title: Maritime Transport
Metadata.description: We offer comprehensive maritime transport services tailored to individual client needs.
Metadata.keywords: enka, enka shipping, enka forwarding, forwarding, logistics, transport, maritime transport, containers, ships, FCL, LCL, container ships, bulk carriers, oversized cargo, project cargo, bulk cargo, intermodal, door-to-door, maritime forwarding, customs clearance

MaritimeTransportPage.title: Maritime Transport
MaritimeTransportPage.subtitle: Maritime transport is one of the pillars of global logistics, enabling efficient and economical transportation of goods over long distances. Through cooperation with major shipping lines and port terminals worldwide, we offer comprehensive maritime transport services tailored to our clients' individual needs.

OfferServices.title: Container Transport – FCL and LCL
OfferServices.subtitle: We offer full service for all types of containers tailored to client needs.
OfferServices.altText: Two docking container ships at a cargo port

1.content: Full-container transport for large cargo.

2.content: Consolidation of smaller shipments into one container to optimize costs.

3.content: Standard, refrigerated (reefer), open-top, flat rack, and others.

OfferOversize.title: Oversized Cargo and Project Cargo
OfferOversize.subtitle: We provide professional handling of large and complex transport projects.
OfferOversize.altText: Cargo ship with a crane docking at the port

1.content: Organizing transport of industrial equipment, steel structures, turbines, generators.

2.content: Transport of construction machinery, energy equipment, infrastructure elements.

3.content: Loading and unloading using port cranes and RO-RO and LO-LO systems.

OfferBulk.title: Bulk and Breakbulk Cargo Transport
OfferBulk.subtitle: We offer efficient and tailored solutions for bulk cargo transportation.
OfferBulk.altText: Group of bulk carriers at sea near the coast

1.content: Transporting raw materials, chemicals, grains, metal ores, fuels.

2.content: Transporting goods requiring individual logistical approaches.

3.content: Adapting vessels to specific client needs.

OfferIntermodal.title: Intermodal and Door-to-Door Logistics
OfferIntermodal.subtitle: Comprehensive supply chain service in a door-to-door model.
OfferIntermodal.altText: Container ship docked at a coastal port

1.header: Integration with Rail and Road Transport
1.content: Capability to collect and deliver cargo in an intermodal system.

2.content: Ensuring cargo delivery from the port to the destination.

3.content: Managing the entire supply chain in a door-to-door model.

OfferPort.title: Port Services and Maritime Forwarding
OfferPort.subtitle: We provide support in port formalities and administrative processes.
OfferPort.altText: Cargo ship departing from a port near a raised crane

1.content: Comprehensive organization of customs and administrative formalities.

2.content: Possibility of storing cargo in port terminals.

3.content: Supervising loading and unloading, monitoring transport conditions.

OfferRoutes.title: Maritime Transport on All Routes
OfferRoutes.subtitle: We carry out transport on key maritime routes worldwide.
OfferRoutes.altText: Loaded deck of a container ship sailing through the sea

1.content: Asia, North and South America, the Middle East.

2.content: Shipments on Baltic and Mediterranean routes.

3.content: Deliveries to hard-to-reach locations organized according to client requirements.

MaritimeTransportPage.summaryContent: Looking for a maritime transport partner? Contact us – we will find the best solution for your business!

Metadata.title: Our realizations
Metadata.description: Take a look at the gallery of our realisations, in which we present examples of successful transports carried out by Enka.
Metadata.keywords: enka, enka shipping, enka forwarding, shipping, logistics, transportation, river, oversize, inland, marine, truck, FTL, project cargo, breakbulk, pontoons, barges, cranes

RealizationsPage.title: Realizations
RealizationsPage.subtitle: Take a look at the gallery of our realisations, in which we present examples of successful transports carried out by Enka. Each photo is proof of our commitment to delivering your goods on time, regardless of size, route or industry.
